title: Abominable Form
name: Morphrost - Abominable Form
printed_effect:
This Morphrost gets +1 {attack} for each Morphrost
in your Underworld. You can Disenchant {frost}
from this Morphrost in order to Special Cast
a Morphrost that is not Abominable Form
from your Underworld.
effect: This Morphrost gets +1 {attack} for each Morphrost in your Underworld. You can Disenchant {frost} from this Morphrost in order to Special Cast a Morphrost that is not Abominable Form from your Underworld.
